# UC Berkeley, CA NDVI (5 mile radius)

```{r}
# import the naip pre-fire data
naip_multispectral_br5 <- stack("~/GreenSpace_Thesis/Google Earth Images/UC Berkeley 5 mile.png")
# convert data into rasterbrick for faster processing

naip_multispectral_br5 <- brick(naip_multispectral_br5)

# calculate ndvi with naip
naip_multispectral_br5[[4]]

# calculate NDVI using the red (band 1) and nir (band 4) bands
naip_ndvi_br5 <- (naip_multispectral_br5[[4]] - naip_multispectral_br5[[1]]) / (naip_multispectral_br5[[4]] + naip_multispectral_br5[[1]])

# plot the data
plot(naip_ndvi_br5,
     main = "NDVI of UC Berkeley, CA 5 mile",
     axes = FALSE, box = FALSE)
```

```{r}
# view distribution of NDVI values
hist(naip_ndvi_br5,
  main = "NDVI: Distribution of pixels\n NAIP 2018 UC Berkeley,CA 5 mile",
  col = "springgreen",
  xlab = "NDVI Index Value")
```

```{r}
naip_multispectral_ge <- stack("~/GreenSpace_Thesis/Google Earth Images/Geumjeong-gu, SK.png")
# convert data into rasterbrick for faster processing

naip_multispectral_ge <- brick(naip_multispectral_ge)

# calculate ndvi with naip
naip_multispectral_ge[[4]]

# calculate NDVI using the red (band 1) and nir (band 4) bands
naip_ndvi_ge <- (naip_multispectral_ge[[4]] - naip_multispectral_ge[[1]]) / (naip_multispectral_ge[[4]] + naip_multispectral_ge[[1]])

# plot the data
plot(naip_ndvi_ge,
     main = "NDVI of GeumJeong-gu, Busan, SK",
     axes = FALSE, box = FALSE)

# view distribution of NDVI values
hist(naip_ndvi_ge,
  main = "NDVI: Distribution of pixels\n NAIP GeumJeong-gu, Busan, SK",
  col = "springgreen",
  xlab = "NDVI Index Value")
```

## Saving the NDVI Values as integers, converting the rasters to vector matrixes, and creating single data drames 
```{r, warning= FALSE}
#save data as integers 
writeRaster(x = naip_ndvi_br5,
            # where your file will go - update with your file path!
            
            filename="~/final-individual-getlaam/NDVIcomglombr.tif", 	
            format = "GTiff", 					# save as a tif
            datatype = 'INT2S', 
            overwrite=TRUE) 
# convert the raster to vector/matrix ('getValues' converts the RasterLAyer to array) )
nr_br5 <-getValues(naip_ndvi_br5)
str(nr_br5)

writeRaster(x = naip_ndvi_br1,
            filename="~/final-individual-getlaam/NDVIcomglombr1.tif",

str(nr_br1)
```

\newpage

# Creating the data frames for each location
```{r}
data_empty<- data.frame() 

data_rome<- as_tibble(nr_rm) %>% mutate (place="Rome, Italy")

data_newport<- as_tibble(nr_np)%>% mutate(place="Newport Beach, CA")

data_manila<- as_tibble(nr_mp)%>% mutate(place="Manila, Phillippines")
\
data_hongkong<- as_tibble(nr_hkhk)%>% mutate(place="Hong Kong, Hong Kong")

data_berkeley<- as_tibble(nr_br)%>% mutate(place= "Berkeley, CA 5 mile")

data_berkeley1<- as_tibble(nr_br1)%>% mutate(place= "Berkeley, CA")

NDVIcombined<- bind_rows(data_rome, data_newport, data_manila, data_hongkong,data_berkeley, data_berkeley1 )

NDVIcombined%>% group_by(place)%>% summarize(mean_value= mean(value, na.rm= TRUE))
```
\newpage

# Plotting NDVI Values by site for a visual comparison 
```{r fig.height= 10, fig.width=20, comment= FALSE} 
    ggplot(NDVIcombined, aes(x= value, fill= place)) +
    geom_histogram(position = "dodge")+
    ggtitle("Picture Derived NDVI - All Sites, Dodge Histogram") +
    xlab("NDVI Values") + ylab("Frequency: Number of Occurances") +
    theme(text = element_text(size=20))
  
```
\newpage
```{r fig.height=13, fig.width= 15}
    ggplot(NDVIcombined, aes(x= value, fill= place)) +
    geom_density(alpha = 0.3)+
    ggtitle("Picture Derived NDVI - All Sites, Density Histogram") +
    xlab("NDVI Values") + ylab("Frequency") +
    theme(text = element_text(size=20))
```
\newpage
